kickstart.post:
if test -d /opt/opal; then
# apbs 1.3 serial apbsver=1.3 apbs_bin=/opt/apbs-1.3/bin/apbs if test -e $apbs_bin; then $ANT -f $OPALXML deploy -DserviceName=apbs_${apbsver} -DappConfig=$OPALCONFIG/apbs_${apbsver}.xml fi
# apbs 1.3 parallel apbsver=1.3 apbs_bin=/opt/apbs-1.3/bin/apbs.sh if test -e $apbs_bin; then $ANT -f $OPALXML deploy -DserviceName=apbs_parallel_${apbsver} -DappConfig=$OPALCONFIG/apbs_parallel_${apbsver}.xml fi
fi
